name: Capture the box
description:
This is a classical capture the flag - take the flag from opponents base and bring it to yours to score points. But mind the traps, guns and all the other dangerous things on the field.

There is twist though - any player can disable controls for everyone else! This can be an unfair advantage, or a way to ruin your game, so use wisely.

Local multiplayer with up to four players.

Hardcore mode for demanding players.
